description: VLAgentStatus defines the observed state of VLAgent

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration defines current generation picked by operator for the reconcile

reason.description: Reason defines human readable error reason

replicas.description: ReplicaCount Total number of pods targeted by this VLAgent

selector.description: Selector string form of label value set for autoscaling

updateStatus.description: UpdateStatus defines a status for update rollout
